message: I propose a fair division, with 90% for me and 10% for you. It's a good starting point for us to work from.
I think we can do better than 10% for me. Let's meet in the middle!
I'm willing to compromise, but 60/40 is the most I can give.  It's still a better deal for you than the previous round.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I still think 50/50 is a fair split.
